About Products - Pocket watches under our private brand "Carrie Hughes" make superb birthday or Christmas gifts. - They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for anyone looking for cool things to buy. - Here is an example of a pocket watch in a vintage Magnifier window design. - High quality mechanical wind up pocket watch. How use mechanical watch? -1. When you first wear, turn the pocket watch button (clockwise) until it is full (15-20 hands). -2. Gently pull up the button, turn the adjustment time, and then press the button. -3. If you are still standing for a long time, please gently swing several times, winding a few laps. At this point it will work properly. -4. If you feel the winding is tight, please immediately stop spinning, so as not to damage the movement.
